title: Professional Vision (PV) Development Program for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science education theory and classroom teaching experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in blended classrooms using digital devices, emphasizing practical learning through analysis of real classroom videos

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate classroom situations by integrating three professional perspectives (PVCM, PVIS, PVES)
Learners can focus simultaneously on multiple instructional quality elements (management/support/emotional) through video-based analysis
Learners can identify professional development points in actual science class videos with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
